attributes.action: Declare the day after the World Cup (16/7/18) a bank holiday, when England win.
attributes.additional_details: If any more evidence were needed: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RJqimlFcJsM
attributes.background:
All the signs are there, the stars have aligned, the weather has arrived and the country is united! The only thing missing is the Jules Rimet and a bank holiday the day after. Let's be honest, no work will be done anyway.

We still believe
Football's coming home
